text: hey everyone eric here uh up with the next segment of small stacks and what i wanted to walk through is how i'm building my watch list and then what positions i'm looking at for my initial outlay now what i want to say up front is if there's anything that you all would add to the watch list feel free let me know i'm happy to put anything in here it has been a while admittedly where i've been constrained by price so it is a good skill set to refresh there are definitely a lot of trade-offs that need to be made but i still am pretty comfortable with some of the products that i dug up so let's get right to it so first off for the watch list development these are a few things that i'm you know keeping an eye on i definitely would prefer items within the s p 500 prefer weeklies notice the word prefer is i stopped writing it but it's essentially for all of these whereas when i trade my normal account and price doesn't really matter that much you know these become hard and fast i won't trade something that if i'm trading let's say the coverage strangle i won't trade something that doesn't have a at least a two percent yield whereas there's a lot of sacrifice that needs to be made in smaller accounts and it's just how it goes so that's why you see the word prefer
